message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $15,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $10,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $15,000 is really the lowest I can go right now. This product is in high demand, and I know its value.  What do you say?
